type.name: org.gradle.api.internal.IConventionAware
type.description:
Allows default values for the properties of this object to be declared. Most implementations are generated at run-time from existing classes, by a org.gradle.api.internal.ClassGenerator implementation.

Each getter of an IConventionAware object should use the mappings to determine the value for the property, when no value has been explicitly set for the property.

method.name: getConventionMapping
method.description:
Returns the convention mapping for the properties of this object. The returned mapping object can be used to manage the mapping for individual properties.

returns:The mapping. Never returns null.

property.name: conventionMapping
property.description:
Returns the convention mapping for the properties of this object. The returned mapping object can be used to manage the mapping for individual properties.

returns:The mapping. Never returns null.
